Operation 'post_/geomarks/copy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary is too long and verbose. Description lacks clarity about the output (new geomark creation) and side effects (combined attribution). Added concise summary, clarified input mechanism, and explicitly stated the return value and attribution handling for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Create a new geomark by copying the geometries from one or more existing geomarks from the current server.
data.current_description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new geomark by copying geometries from one or more existing geomarks on the current server. Specify source geomarks using the geomarkUrl parameter; repeat the parameter to source from multiple geomarks. Returns a new geomark resource with the copied geometries and combined attribution.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too long and verbose. Description lacks clarity about the output (new geomark creation) and side effects (combined attribution). Added concise summary, clarified input mechanism, and explicitly stated the return value and attribution handling for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/boundingBox.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Current description is completely incorrectit describes a copy operation, not a bounding box retrieval. Summary is adequate but description needs complete replacement. Added clarity about what a bounding box represents, output format options, and practical use cases for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Gets the bounding box of the geomark
data.current_description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the bounding box (minimum and maximum coordinate bounds) of the specified geomark. The bounding box is returned in the requested file format and coordinate system, representing the rectangular extent that encompasses all geometries in the geomark. Useful for determining spatial coverage or setting map view extents.
data.reasoning: Current description is completely incorrectit describes a copy operation, not a bounding box retrieval. Summary is adequate but description needs complete replacement. Added clarity about what a bounding box represents, output format options, and practical use cases for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description is unclear about what 'info' contains and lacks specificity about returned content. Improved summary to be more descriptive. Enhanced description to clarify that it returns metadata, attribution, and resource URLs, and explain the practical purpose for client applications.

data.current_summary: Get information about a particular geomark
data.current_description: The attribution can be downloaded as a info file format. The download files can then be processed by a client application to access the geomark info fields and to get the URLs to the geometry download resources.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve geomark metadata and resource URLs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves metadata and attribution information for the specified geomark in the requested file format. Returns geomark info fields and URLs to access the geometry download resources (feature, bounding box, parts, point). Enables client applications to discover available geomark resources and their access endpoints.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description is unclear about what 'info' contains and lacks specificity about returned content. Improved summary to be more descriptive. Enhanced description to clarify that it returns metadata, attribution, and resource URLs, and explain the practical purpose for client applications.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/parts.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description has a typo ('geomerty') and lacks information about output format/coordinate system options and practical use cases. Enhanced description to fix typo, clarify output format flexibility, and explain when AI agents would use this operation for geometry decomposition.

data.current_summary: Get the individual geometries within a multi-part geometry
data.current_description: The geomark parts resource returns a one or more spatial features. One for each part of the Geomark's geomerty. Each part contains a single (Point, LineString, Polygon) geometry and the geomark attribution.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves individual geometry parts from a multi-part geomark as separate spatial features. Returns one feature for each part of the geomark's geometry, where each feature contains a single geometry (Point, LineString, or Polygon) and the geomark attribution. The parts are returned in the requested file format and coordinate system. Useful for processing or analyzing individual components of complex geometries.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description has a typo ('geomerty') and lacks information about output format/coordinate system options and practical use cases. Enhanced description to fix typo, clarify output format flexibility, and explain when AI agents would use this operation for geometry decomposition.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/point.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and adequate. Description is comprehensive but verbose and repetitive (mentions download files twice). Condensed description while preserving all essential information about point derivation logic, output format options, and practical use cases. Improved clarity for AI agent decision-making about when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Gets a single spatial point representative of the geomark.
data.current_description: The geomark point resource returns a single spatial feature with a single Point and the geomark attribution.  The point geometry will be created from the first geometry part of the Geomark. Point geomarks will return the first Point part in the geomark.  LineString geomarks will return the first coordinate of the first LineString part in the geomark. Polygon geomarks will return the centroid or another point inside the first Polygon part in the geomark. The geometry and attribution can be downloaded as a spatial download file format in a supported coordinate system. The download files can then be used in a desktop GIS application (e.g. ArcMap), Google Earth or a web mapping application.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single representative point for the specified geomark along with its attribution. The point is derived from the first geometry part based on geometry type: Point geomarks return the first point; LineString geomarks return the first coordinate; Polygon geomarks return the centroid or an interior point. The point is returned in the requested file format and coordinate system. Useful for creating point-based representations of complex geometries for mapping or spatial analysis.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and adequate. Description is comprehensive but verbose and repetitive (mentions download files twice). Condensed description while preserving all essential information about point derivation logic, output format options, and practical use cases. Improved clarity for AI agent decision-making about when to use this operation.

Operation 'post_/geomarks/copy' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original summary is too long and verbose. Description lacks clarity about the output (new geomark creation) and side effects (combined attribution). Added concise summary, clarified input mechanism, and explicitly stated the return value and attribution handling for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_summary: Create a new geomark by copying the geometries from one or more existing geomarks from the current server.
data.current_description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new geomark by copying geometries from one or more existing geomarks on the current server. Specify source geomarks using the geomarkUrl parameter; repeat the parameter to source from multiple geomarks. Returns a new geomark resource with the copied geometries and combined attribution.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too long and verbose. Description lacks clarity about the output (new geomark creation) and side effects (combined attribution). Added concise summary, clarified input mechanism, and explicitly stated the return value and attribution handling for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/boundingBox.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Current description is completely incorrectit describes a copy operation, not a bounding box retrieval. Summary is adequate but description needs complete replacement. Added clarity about what a bounding box represents, output format options, and practical use cases for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Gets the bounding box of the geomark
data.current_description: The source geomarks can be specified by with the geomarkUrl parameter.  Repeat the parameter if sourcing from multiple geomarks
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the bounding box (minimum and maximum coordinate bounds) of the specified geomark. The bounding box is returned in the requested file format and coordinate system, representing the rectangular extent that encompasses all geometries in the geomark. Useful for determining spatial coverage or setting map view extents.
data.reasoning: Current description is completely incorrectit describes a copy operation, not a bounding box retrieval. Summary is adequate but description needs complete replacement. Added clarity about what a bounding box represents, output format options, and practical use cases for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description is unclear about what 'info' contains and lacks specificity about returned content. Improved summary to be more descriptive. Enhanced description to clarify that it returns metadata, attribution, and resource URLs, and explain the practical purpose for client applications.

data.current_summary: Get information about a particular geomark
data.current_description: The attribution can be downloaded as a info file format. The download files can then be processed by a client application to access the geomark info fields and to get the URLs to the geometry download resources.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve geomark metadata and resource URLs
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves metadata and attribution information for the specified geomark in the requested file format. Returns geomark info fields and URLs to access the geometry download resources (feature, bounding box, parts, point). Enables client applications to discover available geomark resources and their access endpoints.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description is unclear about what 'info' contains and lacks specificity about returned content. Improved summary to be more descriptive. Enhanced description to clarify that it returns metadata, attribution, and resource URLs, and explain the practical purpose for client applications.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/parts.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description has a typo ('geomerty') and lacks information about output format/coordinate system options and practical use cases. Enhanced description to fix typo, clarify output format flexibility, and explain when AI agents would use this operation for geometry decomposition.

data.current_summary: Get the individual geometries within a multi-part geometry
data.current_description: The geomark parts resource returns a one or more spatial features. One for each part of the Geomark's geomerty. Each part contains a single (Point, LineString, Polygon) geometry and the geomark attribution.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves individual geometry parts from a multi-part geomark as separate spatial features. Returns one feature for each part of the geomark's geometry, where each feature contains a single geometry (Point, LineString, or Polygon) and the geomark attribution. The parts are returned in the requested file format and coordinate system. Useful for processing or analyzing individual components of complex geometries.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate and action-oriented. Description has a typo ('geomerty') and lacks information about output format/coordinate system options and practical use cases. Enhanced description to fix typo, clarify output format flexibility, and explain when AI agents would use this operation for geometry decomposition.

message: Operation 'get_/geomarks/{geomarkId}/point.{fileFormatExtension}' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details, missing_context. Summary is clear and adequate. Description is comprehensive but verbose and repetitive (mentions download files twice). Condensed description while preserving all essential information about point derivation logic, output format options, and practical use cases. Improved clarity for AI agent decision-making about when to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Gets a single spatial point representative of the geomark.
data.current_description: The geomark point resource returns a single spatial feature with a single Point and the geomark attribution.  The point geometry will be created from the first geometry part of the Geomark. Point geomarks will return the first Point part in the geomark.  LineString geomarks will return the first coordinate of the first LineString part in the geomark. Polygon geomarks will return the centroid or another point inside the first Polygon part in the geomark. The geometry and attribution can be downloaded as a spatial download file format in a supported coordinate system. The download files can then be used in a desktop GIS application (e.g. ArcMap), Google Earth or a web mapping application.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single representative point for the specified geomark along with its attribution. The point is derived from the first geometry part based on geometry type: Point geomarks return the first point; LineString geomarks return the first coordinate; Polygon geomarks return the centroid or an interior point. The point is returned in the requested file format and coordinate system. Useful for creating point-based representations of complex geometries for mapping or spatial analysis.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and adequate. Description is comprehensive but verbose and repetitive (mentions download files twice). Condensed description while preserving all essential information about point derivation logic, output format options, and practical use cases. Improved clarity for AI agent decision-making about when to use this operation.
